Game.Name: Yuu Yuu Jinsei - Victory Life (Japan)
Game.plot: A 'Game of Life' style board game that the Japanese seem fond of. You and either computer or real players take it in turns to 'roll' the spinner (dice) and make your way around the game board. Certain squares allow you to gamble, others let you take out insurance, and others let you get money from the bank. As you progress, your character gets married, has kids and goes through life experiences.HINTS:- Buster Brothers Mini-Game -Before spinning the roulette, press Select, then hold I, II, Run, and press Selecthttp://www.pcengine.co.uk/HTML_Games/Yu_Yu_Jinsei.htmCheat: GamesPlay any game and when all the players reach the goal, at the blue landscape screen with the big Japanese letters right after the "GOAL" screen, press Select. If done right, you'll enter the Staff List menu.Cheat: GamesWhile playing, when your turn comes up, you'll see your car on the map before the game automatically takes you to the roulette screen. Right before that happens, while the car is stationary on the map, hold II and use the directional pad to be able to see the whole map.Cheat: GamesAt the title screen, hold Select and press Run. You'll enter the name entry screen. Now hold Run and press Select to go back to the title screen. Finally hold Select and press Run again. Now, start the game and when you get to select your characters, everyone will be replaced with ugly characters.
Game.Notes: A ‘Game of Life’ style board game that the Japanese seem fond of. You and either computer or real players take it in turns to ‘roll’ the spinner (dice) and make your way around the game board. Certain squares allow you to gamble, others let you take out insurance, and others let you get money from the bank. As you progress, your character gets married, has kids and goes through life experiences. It can be played without knowledge of Japanese but very much relies on it to enjoy the game in any way.
